game.name: Rizline
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Workshop, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Stats, Includes level editor, Family Sharing, Steam Timeline
game.shortDescription: Rhythm connects! Dive into a mesmerizing journey where points and lines dance in harmony, weaving an extraordinary geometric tapestry set to the innermost beat of your heart!
